metadata.title: CVE-2020-10185 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The sync endpoint in YubiKey Validation Server before 2.40 allows remoteattackers to replay an OTP. NOTE: this issue is potentially relevant topersons outside Yubico who operate a self-hosted OTP validation servicewith a non-default configuration such as an open sync pool; the issue doesNOT affect YubiCloud.

criterions.comment: yubikey-val: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
